languages.text: {n}Идира пристально смотрит на техножреца, жуя губу. Затем наклоняется к вам.{/n} "Странно голоса про него толкуют... разное... спутанное... словно и про разных людей совершенно... но угрозы от него вам нет. Даже если после этих фейерверков и не особо верится".

{n}Idira has been staring at the Tech-Priest, biting her lip. She finally leans in to your ear.{/n} "The voices are being weird about him... They're saying garbled, conflicting things... like they're talking about completely different people... but he's not a threat to you. Even if that's a bit hard to believe after all the fireworks."
languages.original_text: {n}Идира пристально смотрит на техножреца, жуя губу. Затем наклоняется к вам.{/n} "Странно голоса про него толкуют... разное... спутанное... словно и про разных людей совершенно... но угрозы от него вам нет. Даже если после этих фейерверков и не особо верится".

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira has been staring at the Tech-Priest, chewing on her lip. She finally leans to your ear.{/n} "The voices are being all weird about him... They say mixed, conflicting things... like they're talking about completely different people... but he's not a threat to you. Even if that's a bit hard to believe after all the fireworks."

They're saying garbled, conflicting things... like they're talking about completely different people... but he's not a threat to you. Even if that's a bit hard to believe after all the fireworks."

They're saying garbled, conflicting things... like they're talking about completely different people... but he's not a threat to you. Even if that's a bit hard to believe after all the fireworks."

languages.text: {n}Idira hat den Techpriester angestarrt und beißt sich auf die Lippen. Nun lehnt sie sich zu dir und flüstert:{/n} "Die Stimmen sind merkwürdig, was ihn anbelangt ... Sie sagen wirre, widersprüchliche Dinge ... als sprächen sie von völlig verschiedenen Personen ... aber er ist keine Bedrohung für Euch. Auch wenn das nach dem ganzen Feuerwerk schwer zu glauben scheint."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira has been staring at the Tech-Priest, biting her lip. She finally leans in to your ear.{/n} "The voices are being weird about him... They're saying garbled, conflicting things... like they're talking about completely different people... but he's not a threat to you. Even if that's a bit hard to believe after all the fireworks."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira hat den Techpriester angestarrt und beißt sich auf die Lippen. Nun lehnt sie sich zu dir und flüstert:{/n} "Die Stimmen sind merkwürdig, was ihn anbelangt ... Sie sagen verschiedene, widersprüchliche Dinge ... als sprächen sie von völlig verschiedenen Personen ... aber er ist keine Bedrohung für Euch. Auch wenn das nach dem ganzen Feuerwerk schwer zu glauben scheint."

languages.text: {n}Idira observe le technoprêtre un long moment en se mordant la lèvre, puis se penche vers votre oreille.{/n} « Les voix me racontent des choses étranges à son sujet... Leurs propos sont confus et elles se contredisent, comme si elles parlaient de plusieurs personnes à la fois... mais vous ne courez aucun danger, même si je sais que c'est difficile à croire, après ce spectacle pyrotechnique. »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira has been staring at the Tech-Priest, biting her lip. She finally leans in to your ear.{/n} "The voices are being weird about him... They're saying garbled, conflicting things... like they're talking about completely different people... but he's not a threat to you. Even if that's a bit hard to believe after all the fireworks."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira observe le technoprêtre un long moment en se mordant la lèvre, puis se penche vers votre oreille.{/n} « Les voix me racontent des choses étranges à son sujet... Elles se contredisent, comme si elles parlaient de plusieurs personnes à la fois... mais vous ne courez aucun danger, même si je sais que c'est difficile à croire, après ce spectacle pyrotechnique. »

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉一直盯着这位技术神甫，咬着嘴唇。到最后，她凑到你身边，开了口。{/n}“关于这个人……那些声音非常古怪……它们的话充满矛盾，完全对不上号……就好像在谈论好几个不同的人一样……虽然这里放了这么多炮仗，这些话听起来也不太可信，不过这个人对你没有任何威胁。”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira has been staring at the Tech-Priest, biting her lip. She finally leans in to your ear.{/n} "The voices are being weird about him... They're saying garbled, conflicting things... like they're talking about completely different people... but he's not a threat to you. Even if that's a bit hard to believe after all the fireworks."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉一直盯着这位技术祭司，咬着嘴唇。到最后，她凑到你身边，开了口。{/n}“关于这个人……那些声音非常古怪……他们的话充满矛盾，完全对不上号……就好像在谈论好几个不同的人一样……虽然这里放了这么多炮仗，这些话听起来也不太可信，不过这个人对你没有任何威胁。”

languages.text: {n}イディラは唇を噛んで技術司祭を見つめている。彼女はついに口を開く。{/n}「あの人に関する声は妙な感じなの…全部が混ざりあって矛盾したことを言ってて…まるで全くの別人について話しているみたいに。でも、彼は陛下への脅威にはならないわ。あんなことの後じゃ、信じるのはちょっと難しいかもしれないけれど」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira has been staring at the Tech-Priest, biting her lip. She finally leans in to your ear.{/n} "The voices are being weird about him... They're saying garbled, conflicting things... like they're talking about completely different people... but he's not a threat to you. Even if that's a bit hard to believe after all the fireworks."

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは唇を噛んで、技術司祭を見つめている。彼女はついに口を開く。{/n}「彼についての話は妙なの…皆混ざりあって矛盾したことを言っている…まるで全くの別人について話しているみたいに。でも、彼はあなたへの脅威にはならないわ。あんなことの後じゃ、信じるのはちょっと難しいかもしれないけれど」

languages.text: {n}Idira lleva un tiempo observando al tecnosacerdote, mordiéndose el labio. Luego, se acerca a tu oído.{/n} «Las voces dicen cosas raras sobre él... Son incoherentes, opuestas... como si estuvieran hablando de dos personas completamente diferentes... pero no presenta una amenaza para usted. Aunque le cueste creerlo después de los fuegos artificiales».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira has been staring at the Tech-Priest, biting her lip. She finally leans in to your ear.{/n} "The voices are being weird about him... They're saying garbled, conflicting things... like they're talking about completely different people... but he's not a threat to you. Even if that's a bit hard to believe after all the fireworks."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira lleva un tiempo observando al tecnosacerdote, mordiéndose el labio. Luego, se acerca a tu oído.{/n} «Las voces dicen cosas raras sobre él... Son variadas, opuestas... como si estuvieran hablando de dos personas completamente diferentes... pero no presenta una amenaza para usted. Aunque le cueste creerlo después de los fuegos artificiales».

languages.original_text: {n}Idira has been staring at the Tech-Priest, biting her lip. She finally leans in to your ear.{/n} "The voices are being weird about him... They're saying garbled, conflicting things... like they're talking about completely different people... but he's not a threat to you. Even if that's a bit hard to believe after all the fireworks."

languages.text: {n}İdira, dudağını ısırarak gözlerini Tekno Rahip'e dikiyor. Nihayet senin kulağına doğru eğiliyor.{/n} "Sesler onun hakkında bir garip konuşuyor. Karman çorman, çelişkili şeyler söylüyorlar. Sanki hepten farklı insanlardan bahsediyorlarmış gibi... Fakat bize zarar vermez. Patlamadan sonra buna inanması zor olsa da."

They're saying garbled, conflicting things... like they're talking about completely different people... but he's not a threat to you. Even if that's a bit hard to believe after all the fireworks."
